title: A Man Ran Over A Muslim Family With His Truck Because Of Their Religion, Police Say
content:
1. A Man Ran Over A Muslim Family With His Truck Because Of Their Religion, Police Say  NPR
  2. Canadian Muslim family killed in hate crime, police say  Reuters
